othrStdyMat.relMat: The City of Edmonton Neighbourhood Boundaries GIS (.shp) and Google Earth (.kml) files can be found on the City of Edmonton Open Data Catalogue

otherMat.txt: This table includes characteristics of people in Edmonton neighborhoods such as population, age, sex, dwellings, families, marital status and language.
.ivt file, compatible with Beyond 20/20 This table includes characteristics of people in Edmonton neighborhoods such as population, age, sex, dwellings, families, marital status and language.

.ivt file, compatible with Beyond 20/20 This table provides statistical information about people in Edmonton neighborhoods by their demographic, social and economic characteristics as well as provide information about the housing units in which they live.

This table provides statistical information about people in Edmonton neighborhoods by their demographic, social and economic characteristics as well as provide information about the housing units in which they live.
